CustomField.formula: IF ( ( AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate ) > 0, FLOOR( (AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate))*24*60 + FLOOR( 24 * ( (AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate)) ))*60 + ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( (AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( (AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((AWB_Sent_Date__c - CreatedDate)) ),8)) ),0) , NULL)
CustomField.label: Time to AWB
